### Overview

SPO-14582: Data Analysis is a seminar offered in the [M.Sc. Sport Science for Health](https://www.sportwissenschaft.uni-konstanz.de/en/study/master-of-science/){.external target="_blank"} at the University of Konstanz. It provides an introduction to data analysis using the statistical programming software R. Students will learn the basics of R programming and how to use R for common data analysis tasks.

### Class Meetings

```{r, echo = FALSE, message = FALSE, warning = FALSE}
library(googlesheets4)
library(gt)
library(tidyverse)

```

::: column-screen
```{r, echo = FALSE}
d |>
  mutate(
    When = When,
  ) |>
  gt() |> 
  fmt_date(When, date_style = 30) |> 
  data_color(
    rows = Topic == "Holiday",
    method = "factor",
    palette = "gray90",
    na_color = "gray90") |> 
  sub_missing(columns = c(When, What, Topic, Who), missing_text = "") %>%
  text_transform(cells_body(columns = c(Who)),

        grepl("&", x, fixed = TRUE) ~ "<img src='images/Bieleke.png' alt='Maik Bieleke' style='width:25px;height:25px;'> <img src='images/Stähler.png' alt='Johanna Stähler' style='width:25px;height:25px;'>",

        TRUE ~ ""
      )
    }
  )
```

### Teaching Team

![](images/Bieleke.png){style="float:right;padding: 0 0 0 10px;" fig-alt="Headshot of Dr. Maik Bieleke" width="125"}

[Dr. Maik Bieleke](https://www.sportwissenschaft.uni-konstanz.de/schueler/staff/team/dr-maik-bieleke/){.external target="_blank"} is senior researcher and data scientist at the department of sport science at the University of Konstanz. His research focus is on sport psychology, with a special emphasis on motivation, effort, and performance in both laboratory and real-life settings. He has 10+ years of experience in working with R for data analysis and teaching R to students and researchers.
